comment: Cox's Bazar is absolutely stunning! The beach is clean, and the views are mesmerizing. A must-visit!
The Sundarbans are magical! The boat ride was serene, and the wildlife was amazing. Highly recommended.
Bandarban Hill Tracts are perfect for adventure lovers. Trekking was challenging but worth every moment.
Saint Martin's Island is paradise on earth. The coral reefs are breathtaking, but it gets crowded during peak season.
Srimangal Tea Gardens are peaceful, but there isn’t much else to do. Great for a short trip.
Ahsan Manzil is a treasure trove of history. The museum is well-maintained and worth the visit.
Lalbagh Fort is fascinating. It’s a great spot for history enthusiasts, though it can get crowded.
Kuakata is serene and less crowded than Cox's Bazar. Watching both sunrise and sunset is unforgettable.
The hanging bridge in Rangamati is a fun experience, and the view of Kaptai Lake is beautiful. Worth a visit!
